title: Request for new Settings: Do not dock to tab when minimazing from Full screen
author: vavra
body_snippet:
I'fd like to have mRemoteNG only as a directory of connections and connection credentials.

## Expected Behavior
When a rdp window is in Full screen and I want to minimize or resize, the window returns back to the tab.
I'd like to have a general mRemoteNG settings that will leave rdp window as a standalone Windows window a let me manipulate such window like I currently can - eg. move to an another monitor, etc.
